instlnAggregator.mainSelect: select a.dbi_original_key_pr as cncon, --0 a.ctar1, --1 decode(a.ctipo, '3', 'G', '1', 'P', 'P'), --2 decode(a.ctipo, '3', '02', '1', '04', '04'), --3 decode(a.mercato_versione, 'LARGE', 'ECTLGRES00', 'ECTMMRES00'), --4 decode(a.ctipo, '3', 'G001', '1', 'P001', 'ERR'), --5 REGEXP_SUBSTR(a.cncon, '[[:digit:]]+'), --6 a.cpod, --7 dec_rete(a.cdist), --8 dec_anlart(a.ctfor, a.crete), --9 dec_spebene(a.crete, a.ctens), --10 dec_branche(a.ctfor), --11 ulettura --12 from DBI_USER.ifc_sap_anagrcontrele a, z_temp_ulettura b, dbi_user.ifc_sap_statopunti s where a.dbi_original_key_pr in (select cncon from z_pr_in_lavorazione) and a.dbi_original_key_pr = b.cncon and s.cd_punto = a.dbi_original_key_pr /* and s.stato_punto_dbi = 'ATTIVO' and a.d_valido_al = to_date('31/12/9999', 'dd/mm/yyyy') */ order by a.cpod

instlnExtractor.mainSelect: select a.legacy, a.tipo, a.anlage, b.legacy, b.tipo, b.sparte, b.vstelle, ' ', b.bapertyp, b.spebene, b.anlart, b.nodisconct, b.service, b.deregstat, b.ab, b.tariftyp, b.branche, b.aklasse, b.ableinh, c.legacy, c.tipo, c.datefrom, c.timefrom, c.euirole_tech, c.uitype, c.ext_ui, c.uistrutyp, c.grid_id, c.grid_level from instln_key a, instln_data b, instln_pod c where a.legacy = b.legacy and a.legacy = c.legacy
